short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's fix and extend behavior of DBA!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We all like shopping on dba.dk, but their site is old and misses some essential features.
This extension makes shopping experience smoother.
Here are the key features:
- Hide adds
- Open pictures in a new tab instead of a new window
- When search for items, use Cntrl+click on the description to open an item in a new tab (mouse scroll button and Cmd + click are also working)
- Sort results by closest to you
